name: Sour Cream Apple Pie Deluxe
author: phebesue75
summary: This is a delicious recipe combining apples, sour cream, sugar and a few others--to make a scrumptious dessert.  I highly recommend that you use a high quality sour cream-it really does make the difference.
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Press the pie crust into and up the sides of a 9 inch pie plate
In a medium bowl, stir together 3/4 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons of flour, and salt
Mix in the sour cream, egg and vanilla until smooth
Add apples, and stir to coat
Scrape the mixture into the pie shell
Bake for 15 minutes in the preheated oven, then reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue baking for 30 minutes more
While the pie is baking, prepare the topping in a medium bowl
Stir together 1/3 cup of flour, 1/3 cup sugar, and cinnamon
Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles fine crumbs
After the 30 minute bake time has passed, cover the top of the pie with the crumb topping, and continue to bake for 15 minutes, or until topping is lightly browned and apples are tender
Allow the pie to cool, then refrigerate until chilled before serving
